age._comment: keep latets X days of all items

download._comment1: download 10 of each category every minute
download._comment2: download 200 of each category at first run to fill DB

scripts.watch: npm run push:watch & npm run debug:watch
scripts.debug:watch: DB=${npm_config_couchdb}     HOSTNAME=${npm_config_hostname_prod}     KEEP=${npm_package_config_age_keep} ITEMS=${npm_package_config_download_items} logLevel=${npm_package_config_logLevel} nodemon --watch nodeapp/ ./nodeapp/server.js
scripts.deploy: cd sofaapp; kanso push ${npm_config_couchdb};  cd ..; DB=${npm_config_couchdb}  HOSTNAME=${npm_config_hostname_prod}     KEEP=${npm_package_config_age_keepint} ITEMS=${npm_package_config_download_firstrun} logLevel=${npm_package_config_logLevel} node ./nodeapp/server.js
